lore: But reconquering their towns was not enough for the humans. They entered the lands of the Asura to eliminate them once and for all. Their civilization was turned to ash, and they have lived in small tribes since then, earning their living as mercenaries, hunters, thieves and raiders. The one in charge of dispensing torture in the new Asura "empire" is the Fleshstomper. When a slave tries to rebel, this creature makes an example of them so that the others never think about it again.
menagerieDialog: Thank you for this opportunity. You won't regret this.
You lack the controlled anger that is necessary to overcome your enemies.
There is no room in this kingdom for weakness. With your permission, I would like to test your other creatures and determine their might.
Show no mercy. Never hesitate before you make a kill, lest your enemies will turn your pity to their advantage.
We're wasting time here. Let's keep moving. There are still plenty of enemies to defeat.
name: Asura Fleshstomper
